data.event: In 1774 a family named Clark settled in the area and established Jones' Plantation.
In 1796 Jones' Plantation was incorporated as Harlem.

event.title: June 25, 1818, the Town of China was incorporated

data.event: On June 25, 1818, the Town of China was incorporated by combining Harlem, Fairfax (Albion), and Winslow.
